Question: This person collaborated with Eric Stewart on Press to Play (1986), with Stewart co-writing more than half the songs on the LP.
Hints: By 1981, this person felt he had accomplished all he could creatively with Wings and decided he needed a change.
In 1999, this person released Run Devil Run.
During the 1990s, this person collaborated twice with Youth of Killing Joke as the musical duo "the Fireman".
